content.question: In relation to the second paragraph, the third paragraph represents a shift from

choices.label: the town’s history to the narrator’s own history
a character’s perspective to an omniscient narrator’s perspective
a primarily realistic account to a fantastical portrayal
a detailed description to a philosophical commentary

content.answer: a detailed description to a philosophical commentary

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
